channel.title: [Source][Delphi] SendKeys, AppActivate
channel.description:
Now because Delphi doesn't seem to have a SendKeys functions i've been searching a while and i found this include. I don't take any credit for it, but it might come in handy for autotypers and such. (This also has a AppActivate function)
http://delphi.about.com/library/weekly/code/sndkey32.zip
